channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump targets California water policy as he prepares to tour LA fire damage

item.title: Trump continues to defend Jan. 6 pardons, suggests Biden should have pardoned himself
item.description: President Donald Trump continued to defend his controversial pardons of the Jan. 6 rioters with false claims that they were wrongly prosecuted.

item.title: Trump is rolling back a Civil Rights-era anti-discrimination rule
item.description: President Trump revoked a 1965 rule that prohibited federal contractors from discriminating against employees.

item.title: UFO is moving at incredible speeds underwater, congressman says
item.description: Republican Rep. Tim Burchett said that an admiral told him of an unidentified craft moving at incredible speeds in the sea.

item.title: Killing of 2 young brothers triggers outrage in cartel bastion
item.description: Thousands of protesters took to the streets, demanding justice for two boys shot and killed in a city shaken by Sinaloa cartel infighting.
